The '''Goth Grand Hotel''' is a building owned by [[Goth]] and located in [[Mondstadt]]. It has been reserved by the [[Fatui]] delegation. [[Luke]] stands guard outside the entrance, preventing unauthorized access.

==Trivia==
[[File:Location Goth Grand Hotel - Inn Sign.png|thumb]]
*The Chinese, Japanese, and Russian versions of the name use "Goethe" instead of "Goth."
**It may have been inspired by the fact that Germany has numerous places and organizations named after the poet {{w|Johann Wolfgang von Goethe}} (notably {{w|Goethe University Frankfurt}}, the {{w|Goethe-Institut}}, and the {{w|Goethe House}}).<ref>{{w|de:Kategorie:Johann Wolfgang von Goethe als Namensgeber|German Wikipedia: Kategorie:Johann Wolfgang von Goethe als Namensgeber}}</ref>
**"Goethe Hotel" and "Hotel Goethe" do in fact seem to be popular names for hotels in Germany and exist at least in Cologne, Frankfurt, Munich, Ottweiler, Staufen im Breisgau, and Wetzlar.
**This name is also used by two locations in miHoYo's other game title, Honkai: Star Rail's [https://honkai-star-rail.fandom.com/wiki/Goethe_Hotel Goethe Hotel] and [https://honkai-star-rail.fandom.com/wiki/Goethe_Grand_Hotel Goethe Grand Hotel].
*The sign that hangs next to the left of the entrance reads "Inn" in the [[Teyvat Language|common language]]. Interestingly, it appears that the common language uses two written forms for the letter N. Furthermore, the sign only faces one way; looking at the sign from the other side shows the text in reverse (NNI).
